name: Improved Surprise Follow-Through
text: You follow up an attack with a surprising series of sweeping blows.
prerequisites: Str 13, Cleave, Great Cleave, Power Attack, Surprise Follow Through, base attack bonus +8.
benefit: When using Great Cleave, each opponent you attack on your turn (other than the first) is denied his Dexterity bonus against you.
staminaText: When you hit a foe that’s denied its Dexterity bonus via this feat and you use the Surprise Follow-Through combat trick to deal extra damage, the amount of extra damage dealt increases to 1d6 points.
text_zh: 你在一次攻击后突然展开一系列雨点般的打击。
prerequisites_zh: 力量13，顺势斩，大顺势斩，猛力攻击，顺势突袭，BAB+8。
benefit_zh: 当使用“大顺势斩”时，每个你在你的行动轮中攻击的敌人（除了第一个）都失去对你的敏捷加值。
staminaText_zh: 当你击中一个因为这个专长失去敏捷加值的敌人时，你可以使用顺势突袭战策来造成额外伤害，这个造成的额外伤害将提升到1d6。
